analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdSale.contribute (/unique_contracts/0x29ec21157f19f7822432e87ef504d366c24e1d8b.sol#304-339):
	External calls:
	- _bonusRate = PriceStrategy.getRate() (/unique_contracts/0x29ec21157f19f7822432e87ef504d366c24e1d8b.sol#314-316)
	- require(bool)(JointToken.transfer(msg.sender,_jointTransferAmount)) (/unique_contracts/0x29ec21157f19f7822432e87ef504d366c24e1d8b.sol#322-325)
	- require(bool)(OPSToken.transfer(msg.sender,_jointTransferAmount)) (/unique_contracts/0x29ec21157f19f7822432e87ef504d366c24e1d8b.sol#325-326)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value.sub(_ethAmount)) (/unique_contracts/0x29ec21157f19f7822432e87ef504d366c24e1d8b.sol#327)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- AVAILABLE_JOINTTOKENS (/unique_contracts/0x29ec21157f19f7822432e87ef504d366c24e1d8b.sol#330-334)
CrowdSale.destruct (/unique_contracts/0x29ec21157f19f7822432e87ef504d366c24e1d8b.sol) allows anyone to destruct the contract
